casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Leonard Paul SCHALOW 4PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 2, 2018 Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Schalow, Leonard Paul. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Greg Newman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of February 2018 by Defendant to Take Judicial Notice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of February 2018."
